targets.query: SELECT count("request_time"),min("request_time"),max("request_time"),mean("request_time"),percentile("request_time", 99),percentile("request_time", 90),percentile("request_time", 50) FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" < 1000000 AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "http_method" != 'HEAD' AND "uri" != '/auth/1.0' AND "status" >= 200 AND "status" < 300 AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "http_method" != 'HEAD' AND "uri" != '/auth/1.0' AND "status" >= 300 AND "status" < 400 AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "http_method" != 'HEAD' AND "uri" != '/auth/1.0' AND "status" >= 400 AND "status" < 500 AND "status" != 404 AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "http_method" != 'HEAD' AND "uri" != '/auth/1.0' AND "status" >= 500 AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean(request_time) FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent"<=1000000) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean(request_time) FROM "nginx_delete_log" WHERE $timeFilter AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean(request_time) FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length"<=1024000) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("http_method") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "http_method"='GET' AND ("uri" =~ /\?.*/) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "http_method"='GET' AND ("uri" =~ /\?.*/) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

SELECT count("request_time"),min("request_time"),max("request_time"),mean("request_time"),percentile("request_time", 99),percentile("request_time", 90),percentile("request_time", 50) FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent" < 1000000 AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("body_bytes_sent") / sum("request_time") * 8 FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("request_length") / sum("request_time") * 8 FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host_ip"
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host_ip"
SELECT sum("body_bytes_sent") / sum("request_time") * 8 FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(5m),"bucket"
SELECT sum("request_length") / sum("request_time") * 8 FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(5m),"bucket"
SELECT count("request_length") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" >= 0 AND "request_length" < 1000000) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("request_length") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE  ("request_length" >= 1000000 AND "request_length" < 2000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("request_length") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE  ("request_length" >= 2000000 AND "request_length" < 5000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("request_length") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE  ("request_length" >= 5000000 AND "request_length" < 100000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("request_length") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE  ("request_length" >= 100000000 AND "request_length" < 1000000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("request_length") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE  "request_length" >= 1000000000  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("body_bytes_sent") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent" >= 0 AND "body_bytes_sent" < 1000000) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("body_bytes_sent") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  ("body_bytes_sent" >= 1000000 AND "body_bytes_sent" < 2000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("body_bytes_sent") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  ("body_bytes_sent" >= 2000000 AND "body_bytes_sent" < 5000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("body_bytes_sent") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  ("body_bytes_sent" >= 5000000 AND "body_bytes_sent" < 100000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("body_bytes_sent") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  ("body_bytes_sent" >= 100000000 AND "body_bytes_sent" < 1000000000)  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("body_bytes_sent") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE  "body_bytes_sent" >= 1000000000  AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("status")/300 FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT count("status")/300 FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT count("status")/300 FROM "nginx_delete_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

SELECT count("status")/300 FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" > 4095 AND "request_length" < 1024000 AND "request_time" > 0.200) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

SELECT count("status")/300 FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent" > 4095 AND "body_bytes_sent" < 1024000 AND "request_time" > 0.200) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("status" >= 400 AND "status" <500 AND "status" != 404) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("status" >= 500) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("status" = 404) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "status" >= 400 AND "status" != 404 AND "status" < 500 AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host_ip"
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "status" >= 500 AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host_ip"

SELECT "http_method", "status", "request_length", "body_bytes_sent", "request_time", "remote_addr", "http_x_forwarded_for", "host_ip", "uri"  FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("status" >= 400 AND "status"!=404) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  LIMIT 500

SELECT "http_method", "status", "request_length", "body_bytes_sent", "request_time", "remote_addr", "http_x_forwarded_for", "host_ip", "uri"  FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("status" >= 500) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  LIMIT 500
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.100 ) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host_ip"

SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.100 ) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m),"bucket" ORDER BY DESC

SELECT count("status") AS slow_upload FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.100 ) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m),"bucket"
SELECT top(slow_upload, 3) FROM (SELECT count(status) AS slow_upload FROM nginx_upload_log WHERE cluster_name =~ /^$cluster_name$/) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "bucket"
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.100 ) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host_ip"
SELECT count("status") FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.100 ) AND "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m),"bucket"

SELECT "status", "request_length","request_time", "remote_addr", "http_x_forwarded_for", "host_ip","bucket","file"  FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE ("request_length" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.200 ) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  LIMIT 500

SELECT "status","body_bytes_sent", "request_time","remote_addr", "http_x_forwarded_for", "host_ip","bucket","file"  FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE ("body_bytes_sent" < 1000000 AND "request_time" > 0.100 ) AND  "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter  LIMIT 500
SELECT max("op_per_sec") FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("num_osds") *100/3/2 FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("write_op_per_sec") FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("num_osds") *100/3/2 FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("read_op_per_sec") FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("num_osds") *100/3 FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("objects") FROM "ceph_pool_usage" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("total_used_bytes") FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT "commit_latency_ms","apply_latency_ms" FROM "ceph_osd_perf" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "osd_id"
SELECT mean("commit_latency_ms") FROM "ceph_osd_perf" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("apply_latency_ms") FROM "ceph_osd_perf" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT "total_bytes" FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("num_osds") FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("num_up_osds") FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("num_in_osds") FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT "status","request_length","request_time","remote_addr","http_x_forwarded_for","host_ip","bucket","file"  FROM "nginx_upload_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter LIMIT 500

SELECT "status","body_bytes_sent","request_time","remote_addr","http_x_forwarded_for","host_ip","bucket","file" FROM "nginx_download_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter LIMIT 500
SELECT "status","request_time","remote_addr","http_x_forwarded_for","host_ip","bucket","file"  FROM "nginx_delete_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter LIMIT 500
SELECT "status","request_time","remote_addr","http_x_forwarded_for","host_ip","uri"  FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter LIMIT 100

list.name: cluster_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM /^ceph.*$/ WITH KEY = "cluster_name"  WHERE cluster_name   =~ /^.*$/
